ingredients.ingredient: 3 pounds beef short ribs, or more to taste
1 (10.5 ounce) can condensed French onion soup
salt and ground black pepper to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
2 tablespoons chopped fresh rosemary, or more to taste

cookingTips: Brown the short ribs in a skillet first to develop deeper flavor before slow cooking
The combination of soup and chili sauce creates a rich, layered sauce
Fresh rosemary added at the end prevents it from becoming bitter during long cooking
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This slow cooker recipe uses a soup base for convenience. How would you make a more traditional braised short rib sauce?
